vision: Be the best of Logistic Service Provider (LSP) company which is able to service any kind of shipment service requires in constructions field, technical, mechanical, chemical, electrical, telecommunication, cosmetics & retail business.
mission: Professionally take a part in the development of industry that grows rapidly. Support the government policies in the developing of company in order to increase the skill of our Human Resources by developing capability and keep on our quality service. It is not the only certain service but also capability to reach and organize the last result of a project with maximal and satisfied.
